translation.en: Listen up, folks! New guys, can I have your ...
translation.ko: 다들 주목! 신참들, 나 좀 볼까?

translation.en: Before you say anything, let me alert you to the fact
that we haven't been served water for over 12 hours. That's ridiculous.
translation.ko: 우리 12시간 넘도록 물 한 모금 못 마셨어요 정말 황당하네요

translation.en: You'll get water afterwards. First some practical information.
translation.ko: 이따 물 줄 거야 - 유용한 정보부터 알려주지 - 고맙네요

translation.en: Thank you.
We'll be arriving home shortly. That will be a new experience for you.
translation.ko: 곧 고국에 도착해서 새로운 경험을 하게 될 거다

translation.en: None of you have ever been to Norway before.
You have?
No, I haven't been here.
But I have relatives up here, so I know the language.
translation.ko: 근데 친척이 여기 살아서 이 나라 말을 알아요

translation.en: That's lucky. So we understand each other, then.
Yes, I happen to have an extremely good ear for languages.
translation.ko: 그럼요, 어쩌다 보니 제가 언어는 타고났어요

translation.en: -Like top class. World class. -That's amazing.
Well, it's time for the ættestup. Anyone want to go first?
translation.ko: '자살 절벽'에 다 왔습니다 먼저 뛰어내리실 분?

translation.en: Bjørn, you're the oldest. Maybe you should take the first jump.
Well, if someone else wants to jump, it's OK for me.
translation.ko: 먼저 가고 싶은 사람 있으면 난 괜찮네

translation.en: Anyone else have the urge?
-No, no. -No, it's fine. Go ahead.
translation.ko: - 아니, 비에른 먼저 - 괜찮아, 먼저 가시게

translation.en: OK, fine.
If no one wants to jump, I can go.
It's a matter of honor, isn't it?
The ættestup is the most honorable thing you can do.
Honor is really important, Bjørn.
Could you move a bit back there, give Bjørn some space?
translation.ko: 다들 뒤로 물러서서 자리 좀 만들어 주실래요?

translation.en: See you on the other side.
See you.
To Valhalla!
Wow.
Well, anyway, you can expect to work hard up here.
translation.ko: 어쨌든, 도착하면 허리도 못 펴고 일할 테지만

translation.en: But you'll have a chance to learn some new things and have some fun too.
translation.ko: 새로운 걸 배우며 재미도 있을 거야

translation.en: And I can almost guarantee that you'll make some new friends.
Excuse me?
-Yes, question? -What's the pay like? Is it good?
-It's not paid. -We won't get paid?
translation.ko: - 돈은 안 줘 - 돈을 못 받아요? 그래

translation.en: Not to complain, but I think the flow of information here on this boat
translation.ko: 불평은 아니지만 이 보트에서는 정보 소통이 참 제멋대로네요

translation.en: is extremely arbitrary.
And that's totally uncalled for, when we're so crammed together in such a small craft.
translation.ko: 이렇게 다닥다닥 끼여 탔을 땐 더더욱 말이 안 되죠

translation.en: I didn't know until yesterday that we were even going to Norway.
So you think the information flow is under par?
Yes.
-So here's some information for you. -Finally!
translation.ko: - 그럼 내가 알려주지 - 드디어 말이 통하네요

translation.en: Did you see that? Did everyone see that?
There's something seriously wrong with my nose!
translation.ko: 코가 완전히 박살 난 것 같은데

translation.en: -Was that a bit too much? -No, you're the chieftain.
Aren't you supposed to be a little like that when you're in charge?
translation.ko: 책임자 역할 맡으면 원래 그런 거 아니야? 강하게, 맞지?

translation.en: But it's not really me, that fear-based leadership style stuff.
translation.ko: 겁줘서 이끄는 건 내 스타일이 아니야

translation.en: It doesn't feel right.
Can you be my witness?
Oddvar, maybe you want to go next?
I'm thinking, what's the worst thing that could happen -
- if I don't do the ættestup?
I mean, what's worse than being crushed?
I don't know. I was just ordered to take you up here. I mean,
translation.ko: 글쎄요, 저는 시키는 대로 그냥 모셔다드린 거예요 뛰어내리셔서

translation.en: you're supposed to do the jump and spare your families
translation.ko: 뛰어내리셔서 늙은이 부양하는 가족의 짐을 덜어주셔야죠

translation.en: the burden that is supporting you in your old age.
Yeah, but I'm only 47. It's...
I mean, it's not that old.
I'm just going to skip the whole thing.
--OK? -Yeah.
I'm not going to jump either. This is not my kind of thing.
translation.ko: 나도 안 뛰어내릴래 이런 건 별로야

translation.en: Anyone else want to jump?
-Come on, fellas. I mean ... -It's just not very tempting.
translation.ko: - 어르신들, 그러지 마시고... - 전혀 구미가 안 당겨

translation.en: OK. I mean, I'm just a slave.
I can't make you do anything you don't want to do. But, uh...
translation.ko: 싫은 일 하시라고 등 떠밀 수는 없지만...

translation.en: Could you just please stay away from Norheim?
So people don't understand that you didn't do the ættestup?
Of course, no problem. You'll never see us again.
translation.ko: 좋아, 그렇게 하지 우리 다시는 못 볼 거야

translation.en: Great. Thank you. Wonderful.
OK, bye!
Can't exactly say I'm looking forward to coming home now.
translation.ko: 집에 가는 게 기대된다고는 선뜻 말 못 하겠어

translation.en: No?
My focus has always been on pillaging and ravaging and things like that.
translation.ko: 응, 나는 늘 약탈하고 쳐부수는 데만 열중했잖아

translation.en: When all the other guys have settled down with wives, kids, farms and stuff.
translation.ko: 다른 녀석들 가정 꾸리고 농사지을 때 말이야

translation.en: I'm feeling kind of alone here.
Yeah, but isn't that OK, too?
Do as you please. Do whatever you want.
Without having to plan it three full moons ahead.
I live in a tent. The only clothes I have are the ones I'm wearing.
translation.ko: 나는 텐트에 살아 가진 옷이라고는 지금 입은 게 전부지

translation.en: I'm starting to feel a little pathetic here
We have to do something about that.
A good man like you shouldn't be alone if you don't want to.
translation.ko: 자네처럼 멋진 사내가 본의 아니게 혼자 지내면 쓰나

translation.en: You have so much to offer!
No, not that much.
-I think I have a plan for that. -Really?
A plan so crazy it might just work.
Wow!
Oh, it's you.
How did it go?
translation.ko: 어떻게 됐어? 노인네들을 다시는 못 보실 테니 잘 처리된 것 같습니다

translation.en: You'll never see those guys again, so I would say it went great.
translation.ko: 노인네들을 다시는 못 보실 테니 잘 처리된 것 같습니다

translation.en: Good, good.
What is this?
-Hm? -So the rumors are true?
That you sent the old people in the village to their death?
Well, they took the ættestup.
You finally got the chance to run this village, Orm.
translation.ko: 결국, 이 마을을 다스릴 기회를 잡았는데

translation.en: And the result is people are forced to throw themselves to their death
translation.ko: 그 결과가 사람들을 투신자살하게 내모는 거예요?

translation.en: because we don't have any food?
What kind of leadership is that? Are you pleased with yourself?
I think things are starting to fall into place.
-Well I don't. -Well, then we have to agree to disagree.
translation.ko: - 내가 보기엔 아니에요 - 견해 차이를 인정해야겠네요

translation.en: Which is something I've decided to start saying.
Chieftain Olav and his men should have been home
from their raid over a month ago.
It's very strange that you haven't done anything to get them home.
translation.ko: 집으로 데려올 생각 없이 손 놓고 있으니 황당하네요

translation.en: No, but all that stuff is up to Odin and the gods to decide.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 그건 전부 오딘과 신들의 뜻인데

translation.en: I mean, what am I supposed to do?
You could at least have sacrificed some slaves.
Tried to be a little resourceful.
Sacrifice? No, no, no, I don't think that's a good idea.
translation.ko: 노예를 바쳐요? 그건 아닌 것 같네요

translation.en: All that screaming and commotion...
Your wife is also on that ship. You must be sick with worry.
translation.ko: 동서도 배에 탔으니 서방님도 많이 걱정되겠네요

translation.en: No, yes, I am very sick with worry. For Frøya.
You know, it would be incredibly unfortunate if they didn't return home.
translation.ko: 다들 못 돌아오면 지지리 운도 없는 거죠

translation.en: I'd be left with permanent responsibility here and everything.
translation.ko: 내가 이 마을을 다 책임져야 할 거 아닙니까

translation.en: -Then you'd become chieftain. -Yes.
-Isn't that your big dream? -No, no.
I'm heir to the throne, but it's not like
translation.ko: 내가 계승자이긴 해도 족장이 될 꿈은 없어요

translation.en: it's my dream. No, I wouldn't say that.
translation.ko: 내가 계승자이긴 해도 족장이 될 꿈은 없어요 그렇게 말한 적 없습니다

translation.en: Okay, then we'll sacrifice some slaves. OK?
translation.ko: 알겠어요, 그럼 노예 좀 죽여도 되겠죠?

translation.en: No, I don't think so. That's pretty much what people are calling for right now.
translation.ko: - 그건 아닌 것 같은데 - 백성들이 그러길 원해요

translation.en: Are they? We're doing it, Orm.
Yes, well then I will make an executive decision, and say:
-That's what we'll do. -Great. Come on.
Odin, receive our second sacrifice!
Odin, receive our third sacrifice!
Bring our men home!
-Wait, wait just a second. -Yes?
Not to cock up your plans or anything but,
translation.ko: 하시는 일을 방해하려는 건 아니지만 저를 꼭 죽여야겠어요?

translation.en: are you 100% certain that it's necessary to sacrifice me?
Yes. I mean, ritual sacrifice isn't a perfect science, but
translation.ko: 물론이지, 제물 의식이 과학적이진 않지만 난 효과가 있다고 확신해

translation.en: I feel really confident about this one.
Okay, okay.
I just ... you've sacrificed two slaves already.
translation.ko: 저기... 벌써 노예 두 명이나 바치셨는데 신이 과하다고 여기실까 걱정되진 않으세요?

translation.en: You're not worried the gods are gonna think that you're trying too hard?
That it's too much?
translation.ko: 너무하다고 말이죠 참 좋은 생각이지만 오해는 하지 마

translation.en: Mm, I really like the way you're thinking. Don't get me wrong.
translation.ko: 참 좋은 생각이지만 오해는 하지 마

translation.en: I think it's great that you as a slave bother getting involved.
translation.ko: 노예인 자네가 개입하려 애쓰는 건 훌륭해 감사합니다

translation.en: But if you don't mind, I think we'll just move on.
-Oh, okay, of course. -Yes.
I just thought I'd mention it. No point in regretting it later. I mean...
translation.ko: 나중에 후회해 봤자 소용없으니 말해본 겁니다 희생은 절대 되돌릴 수 없잖아요?

translation.en: Sacrifice isn't exactly reversible, but... Okay.
translation.ko: 희생은 절대 되돌릴 수 없잖아요? 알겠어요

translation.en: A ship!
They're coming!
Thank you, Odin. Thank you!
There you go.
Two sacrifices was enough. Should make a note of that.
translation.ko: 두 명 바친 거로 충분했네요 꼭 기록해두세요

translation.en: Hey, Frøya!
You can at least pretend to be happy to see your husband.
translation.ko: 남편 보면 좋은 척이라도 해주지그래 이거 참 당혹스럽네 난처하잖아

translation.en: This is very embarrassing. Kind of awkward.
Holy Loki, it's good to see you, brother!
Look at you, all tan!
-Hi, Orm. -Hi.
So tell me! Where have you been? What have you done?
translation.ko: 말해 봐 어디서 뭐 하고 왔어? 무용담이나 특별했던 일 있나?

translation.en: Any good stories? Any special moments?
Lots of special moments.
It wouldn't be fair to all the other moments if you should bring up just one.
Because they were all so awesome. Oh, wow.
From we got there till we left,
it was just a series of one sweet moment after another.
Lots of, you know, internal jokes and... You wouldn't get it anyway.
translation.ko: 우리끼리 농담도 많이 하고... 아마 넌 이해 못 할 거야

translation.en: Next time I just have to join you.
translation.ko: 다음에는 나도 꼭 같이 가야겠어 허리가 말썽이었는데 이제 많이 좋아졌어

translation.en: My back was a bit... But it's much better now.
-Mm-hmm. Yeah. -Much better.
translation.ko: 허리가 말썽이었는데 이제 많이 좋아졌어 그래, 어쨌든 넌 제수씨 대단한 줄이나 알아

translation.en: You should be really proud of your wife.
translation.ko: 그래, 어쨌든 넌 제수씨 대단한 줄이나 알아

translation.en: Frøya dove into that pillaging 100%.
translation.ko: 프뢰위아가 제 몫을 톡톡히 했어 - 그래? - 맞아

translation.en: Even took part in quite a lot of the raping.
Frøya forced all kinds of monks to let her ride them.
I didn't really expect that. I was totally blown away
translation.ko: 정말 생각도 못 했는데 끙끙대며 신음하는 수도승한테 올라탄 걸 보고

translation.en: when I saw her on top of this monk, moaning and groaning.
translation.ko: 끙끙대며 신음하는 수도승한테 올라탄 걸 보고 진짜 감탄했다니까 그만 해요

translation.en: Did you do that, Frøya?
Of course. I mean, that's what you do when you pillage.
That was kind of unnecessary, wasn't it?
If it's unnecessary? Well, yeah, maybe, but ...
translation.ko: 굳이 안 해도 됐냐고? 그럴 수도 있지만...

translation.en: If you joined a raid, you'd understand how the world works. Yeah.
translation.ko: 세상이 어떻게 돌아가는지 원정 가보면 알 거야

translation.en: Speaking of which, are you going to the party tonight?
translation.ko: 말이 나왔으니 말인데 오늘 밤 파티에 갈 거야?

translation.en: Yeah, sure, aren't we all?
How about pounding some down tepid horns of mead at our place first?
translation.ko: 가기 전에 우리 집에서 미지근한 벌꿀 술이나 뿔잔으로 들이킬까?

translation.en: Well, actually, all of us from the boat
kind of agreed to get together before the party.
Pour out some mead for our dead comrades, reminisce and stuff.
translation.ko: 죽은 전우에게 술을 따라 주고 회포를 풀 거야

translation.en: Reminisce? You just got home a few moments ago.
We're not going to reminisce about the last moments on the boat,
translation.ko: 배에 있었던 마지막 순간이 아니라 거기 처음 도착했던 때를 추억하는 거지

translation.en: we're gonna reminisce about when we first got there.
translation.ko: 거기 처음 도착했던 때를 추억하는 거지

translation.en: The first monastery we pillaged and stuff.
I understand, but it couldn't hurt if I was a fly on the wall, could it?
translation.ko: 그래, 근데 구경하러 가는 건 괜찮잖아

translation.en: You know, I can even bring my own chair.
translation.ko: 내 의자도 챙겨갈게 자리가 늘 모자란다며

translation.en: because you always say there aren't enough seats.
translation.ko: 내 의자도 챙겨갈게 자리가 늘 모자란다며 그래

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, mm.
-I think It would get very crowded -Yeah. if people start bringing their own chairs, Orm.
translation.ko: 다들 자기 의자 챙겨오면 발 디딜 틈도 없을걸

translation.en: Yes, yes, no, but I understand. But I can ...
translation.ko: 그래, 이해는 하는데 밖에 서 있으면 되잖아

translation.en: I can, I can stand outside.
You know, and just talk to the guys who go to the toilet. And stuff like that, that would be OK, wouldn't it?
translation.ko: 화장실 가는 사람한테 말 걸게 그건 괜찮지?

translation.en: I think maybe I heard someone say:
-"3-2-1, no one else can come." -Yeah, that was Ragnar.
translation.ko: 누가 '3, 2, 1, 땡!'이라고 했던 것 같은데 - 맞아요 - 랑나르나 빌야르였어

translation.en: That's not runed in stone, is it?
translation.ko: 꼭 규칙대로 안 해도 되잖아? 그래도 규칙은 존중해야지

translation.en: Stone or not stone, you have to respect it.
Or else it doesn't mean anything.
You know, the whole rhyme would lose its magic.
It's going to be something people just say.
But, Orm, you know what?
We meet up in the great hall afterwards.
-Yeah. -That's good. That's really good.
-Afterwards? -Yes.
After...?
OK...
OK.
Hello? Just one thing.
I had a cape with me on the ship.
Er, er, it's more like a cloak, actually.
Just without the buttons all the way down. But anyway...
translation.ko: 단추가 안 달린 망토인데 어쨌든, 목적지에 도착하면 돌려준다고 약속해서

translation.en: I gave it to one of your colleagues who promised to return it.
When we reached our destination.
So, I don't know... maybe you can ask around for me? Or?
translation.ko: 근데 모르겠네요 좀 알아봐 주실래요? 아니면...

translation.en: -Nope. Come here. -No?
Oh, there he is, there he is! Hi.
He's the one.
I'm the one who lent you my cape.
That's my cape.
This is mine.
-It's yours? -Yeah.
Well isn't that quite a coincidence,
translation.ko: 우리 둘이 로마에서 같은 양복점을 이용한다면 거참 대단한 우연 아닙니까?

translation.en: if you and I happen use the same tailor in Rome?
translation.ko: 같은 양복점을 이용한다면 거참 대단한 우연 아닙니까?

translation.en: And have the same family crest?
I doubt that quite strongly.
Well, that is the case.
Come on, not even you can believe that.
And you're wearing it all wrong. It's getting dirty.
You're wearing it like an amateur.
translation.ko: - 입은 꼴이 딱 초짜네요 - 흙이 싫어?

translation.en: -You don't like dirt? -No. Who does?
-Open your mouth. -Excuse me?
Open your mouth. Don't bite.
-Whose cape is it? -Yours.
-It's my cape. -Yes.
Fast learner.
You're not gonna get away with...
Hey, you! Hi.
You're new, right?
We're gonna be strawmates. Kark is my name.
translation.ko: 나랑 방을 같이 쓸 거야 나는 카르크라고 해

translation.en: I was supposed to be sac...
I was supposed to be sacrificed today.
But I got away, so they gave me a branding instead,
just so I wouldn't feel too lucky.
OK?
-Isn't it amazing? -No.
I'm gonna show you where we're gonna sleep. We're done, right?
translation.ko: 어디서 잘지 알려줄게 다 된 거죠?

translation.en: Yeah, thanks, thanks.
Yeah, this is our spot.
Nice and warm among the animals.
-You're kidding, right? -No.
-I'm not sleeping in this pigsty! -What do you mean? This is sweet.
translation.ko: - 난 돼지우리에서 안 자 - 무슨 말이야? 좋기만 한데

translation.en: Sweet?
What...
What kind of place are those goddamn inbreds running here?
translation.ko: 이게 웬 망할 근친 교배 현장이야?

translation.en: Seriously, you're not going to that pillage reunion, are you?
translation.ko: 당신, 약탈 뒤풀이에 안 갈 거지?

translation.en: Well of course I am.
Couldn't we take a mead here instead, you know, just the two of us, here, at home?
translation.ko: 집에서 나랑 오붓하게 벌꿀 술 마시면 안 돼?

translation.en: Uh, no.
In Loki's name, what's that around your neck?
translation.ko: 맙소사 목에 걸고 있는 건 뭐야?

translation.en: Oh, this is a monk's necklace. It's like a trophy I made.
translation.ko: 수도승 고추 목걸이 내가 손수 만든 전리품이지

translation.en: Is that ... a cock necklace?
Mm-hm. From the monks.
Are those monks giants?
These sizes are completely out of proportion.
Can you imagine, you know, getting hard with a tool like that? You'd be in trouble.
translation.ko: 이런 게 발딱 서면 어떻겠어? 당신 난감할걸

translation.en: Why? Because you'd just drop to the floor.
Your blood would go straight from your head to your tool.
translation.ko: 머리에 있던 피가 아랫도리로 쏠릴 거야

translation.en: You know, you would pass out completely.
No, usually they don't.
Actually this is quite a standard size, I think.
I have exactly the same tool.
I think I know what a huge penis is. Those are abnormal.
translation.ko: 크면 얼마나 큰지 아는데 이건 비정상이야

translation.en: Yes. I'm going to go now.
I just feel sorry for those people who have to walk around with dicks like that. Yes, I'm going.
translation.ko: 그런 물건 달고 돌아다니는 인간들 참 안쓰럽네

translation.en: I feel sorry for them. What a handicap!
Friends. Brothers.
Warriors.
We're here to celebrate that Odin guided us safely home!
translation.ko: 오딘의 은총으로 무사히 집에 온 걸 축하하자

translation.en: -Skål! -Skål!
We're also here to celebrate that we found a way West.
translation.ko: 또한, 서쪽 길을 찾아낸 걸 축하하자

translation.en: To a land that will see to it that we will never again have a lean year.
translation.ko: 그 비옥한 땅 덕분에 앞으로 흉년이란 없을 것이다

translation.en: No matter how poorly the substitute chieftain
translation.ko: 내가 자리를 비운 사이에 임시 족장이 아무리 마을을 말아먹어도 말이다

translation.en: manages the village while I'm away.
translation.ko: 임시 족장이 아무리 마을을 말아먹어도 말이다

translation.en: It's time to celebrate!
Shame on those who don't get drunk!
Yes?
-Great party. -Yeah.
I think my assicle has fallen asleep.
Those benches in there are so, so hard.
translation.ko: 안에 있는 벤치가 너무 딱딱해 하다못해 짐승 가죽이라도 덮어놓을 것이지

translation.en: They could at least throw on a few animal skins.
What do you mean?
The assicle falls asleep. The assicle goes numb. Straight away.
-Assicle? -Assicle.
You don't know what the assicle is?
-Nope. -Assicle.
That little thing that sticks out between the penis and the hole?
translation.ko: 남근이랑 항문 사이에 툭 튀어나온 쪼끄만 거 몰라?

translation.en: On the... perineum?
That little thing that wags when you're excited?
What do you call it?
-I don't know. -Well, I call it the assicle.
I don't know if that's the right word, or you know,
but I call it that, I've always called it that.
So that's how it's gonna stay. OK, see you in there.
Of course the horses didn't see the difference
between coltsfoot and dandelion.
translation.ko: 머위나 민들레가 별반 다를 게 없어요

translation.en: That was quite... peculiar.
Olvar. Liv.
"Milady." That's how they greet
beautiful women in the West.
Wow. Impressive.
Welcome back from the raid. I heard you pillaged well.
Yeah, it was ... It was really good.
Was there something in particular I could help you with?
Yes! Yes, there is one tiny... question.
translation.ko: 그래, 사소하게 궁금한 게 하나 있어

translation.en: -You still have that farm, don't you? -I do. Biggest one in Norheim.
translation.ko: 자네, 그 농장 아직도 있지? 그럼, 노르헤임에서 제일 큰 농장인걸

translation.en: And... it's still going very well?
Oh, it's going good! [chuckles]
Yes, so that's what I wanted to talk to you about.
Because you know I dig you. I always have and always will.
translation.ko: 내가 자네를 좋아하니까 늘 좋아했고 앞으로도 그럴 거야

translation.en: And I really admire you for what you have accomplished.
translation.ko: 자네가 이룬 것들 참 대단하다고 생각해

translation.en: Thank you, Arvid. That's great.
-Skål to Arvid! -Skål!
So I thought I'd challenge you to a holmgang.
What?
Holmgang?!
Yes. And then the winner can take over the loser's
translation.ko: 그래, 이기는 사람이 진 사람의 재산과 아내를 차지하는 거야

translation.en: property and wife and stuff.
translation.ko: 진 사람의 재산과 아내를 차지하는 거야

translation.en: Because that's how the rules are, isn't it, Olav, Chieftain Olav?
translation.ko: 규칙이 그러니까 안 그래, 올라브 족장?

translation.en: That's right. What you say there is right.
But you don't own anything, Arvid!
But that's how the rules are.
And it would be stupid of me not to take advantage of it.
translation.ko: 내가 이런 기회를 활용 안 하면 골이 빈 거지

translation.en: But I built up everything
with my own hands, from nothing!
Yeah. And I really respect you for that.
But still...
I, Arvid, hereby challenge Olvar to a holmgang!
Olvar?
Olvar?
Olvar?
Olvar, are you sitting here hiding?
I'm not hiding, I'm just thinking.
translation.ko: 그게 아니라 생각 좀 하느라 그래

translation.en: You can just forget about hiding.
If you don't show up for the holmgang you'll be deemed a niding. An outcast.
translation.ko: 결투에 안 나타나면 겁쟁이로 찍혀서 왕따 당할걸

translation.en: You'll bring shame on me, indirectly.
It's just that Arvid is so big. I mean...
He has been trained to be a warrior ever since he was a baby.
translation.ko: 그 인간은 아기였을 때부터 전사가 되려고 몸을 단련했어

translation.en: And he has probably killed a thousand men.
I never touched a sword before today.
translation.ko: 난 칼이란 걸 오늘 처음 잡아봐

translation.en: Blah, blah. Don't be so insanely defensive.
translation.ko: 거참 투덜거리네 몸 좀 그만 사려

translation.en: You can beat him. It's all in the mind. It's 99% attitude.
translation.ko: 이길 수 있어 다 마음먹기 나름이야 정신력이 99%인걸

translation.en: -Is it? -Sure.
If you raise your game 5%,
and he lowers his 5%, most of the job is done.
translation.ko: 상대가 이길 확률이 그만큼 떨어지니 그거로 된 거야

translation.en: Are the margins that -small? -Sure.
If you also look at the possibility of thinking a little outside the box,
anything could happen, right?
OK. Good luck. See you there.
Yeah. But, Liv, we...
-We go together.
No, I'm just going with some old friends.
translation.ko: 됐어, 난 오랜 친구랑 갈 거야

translation.en: What? What friends?
"What? Who?" Some old friends.
OK. Should I leave the door open?
Close it.
Good luck!
Olvar.
There you are. That was in the nick of time.
You wish to exchange coins for poison?
Exactly. I got myself messed up in a holmgang over here.
translation.ko: 그래요, 결투할 생각에 내가 제정신이 아닙니다

translation.en: Give me your sword.
Don't send a sword over tip first.
-Easy child's learning. -Sorry.
This is the deadliest poison you can find.
One scratch of his skin and he'll be dead in seconds.
translation.ko: 스치기만 해도 바로 죽은 목숨일 거야

translation.en: OK.
Thank you.
I will be forever in debt to you.
But you gave me money, so...
Yeah.
It's a figure of speech, isn't it?
-Yeah, I guess. -Yeah.
Bye.
Odin!
God of all warriors!
Today you will receive a new guest in Valhalla!
translation.ko: 오늘 발할라로 새 식구가 갈 겁니다

translation.en: Can I say something before we begin?
Yeah, that's fine.
Olvar will say a few words!
Many of you,
perhaps most of you,
don't believe I stand a chance here today.
translation.ko: 보나 마나 내가 질 거라고 믿겠지

translation.en: And to you I will say
this:
Little strokes
fell great oaks.
That's it? Yeah?
Actually, I didn't get it, really.
What I mean to say, Arvid,
is that you will regret challenging me to this holmgang.
translation.ko: 나한테 결투 신청한 걸 후회하게 될 거라는 거다

translation.en: This is the dumbest thing you've ever done.
Why do you say that? You have a secret weapon or something?
translation.ko: 왜 그런 말을 하지? 비장의 무기라도 있나?

translation.en: This is the last thing I will say to you:
The harder you come, the harder you... fall.
-Harder you...? -Fall!
OK, lots of fine words.
Now, let's get ready!
May the best man win.
Three. Two. One.
Holmgang!
Bull's-eye!
Estate owner! Yeah!
Awesome!
It's you and me then.
All right.
Wow, you're so strong!
You think?
OK? Yes.
Kiss me.
